    • –ù–∞–≤—ã–∫–∏ –Ω–∞–ø–∏—Å–∞–Ω–∏—è —Å–ª—É–∂–µ–±–Ω—ã—Ö —Å–∫—Ä–∏–ø—Ç–æ–≤ (Bash/Python/Ruby);
    • –ü–æ–Ω–∏–º–∞–Ω–∏–µ –ø—Ä–æ—Ü–µ—Å—Å–æ–≤ –≤–Ω–µ–¥—Ä–µ–Ω–∏—è –∏ —Å–æ–ø—Ä–æ–≤–æ–∂–¥–µ–Ω–∏—è –ü–û (CI/CD);
    • –ü—Ä–µ–¥—Å—Ç–∞–≤–ª–µ–Ω–∏–µ –æ —Å–∏—Å—Ç–µ–º–∞—Ö –≤–∏—Ä—Ç—É–∞–ª–∏–∑–∞—Ü–∏–∏ (Vmware, Proxmox, KVM –∏ —Ç.–ø.) —è–≤–ª—è–µ—Ç—Å—è –¥–æ–ø–æ–ª–Ω–∏—Ç–µ–ª—å–Ω—ã–º –ø—Ä–µ–∏–º—É—â–µ—Å—Ç–≤–æ–º.

    –û–±—è–∑–∞–Ω–Ω–æ—Å—Ç–∏:

    • –ê–≤—Ç–æ–º–∞—Ç–∏–∑–∞—Ü–∏—è –∫–æ–º–ø–ª–µ–∫—Å–Ω—ã—Ö –∏–Ω—Å—Ç–∞–ª–ª—è—Ü–∏–π –ü–û –ø—Ä–∏ –ø–æ–º–æ—â–∏ –∏–Ω—Å—Ç—Ä—É–º–µ–Ω—Ç–æ–≤ —É–ø—Ä–∞–≤–ª–µ–Ω–∏—è –∫–æ–Ω—Ñ–∏–≥—É—Ä–∞—Ü–∏—è–º–∏;
    • –ü–æ–¥–¥–µ—Ä–∂–∫–∞ –∏ —Å–æ–ø—Ä–æ–≤–æ–∂–¥–µ–Ω–∏–µ —Å—É—â–µ—Å—Ç–≤—É—é—â–∏—Ö –∏–Ω—Å—Ç–∞–ª–ª—è—Ü–∏–π –ü–û;
    • –ü—Ä–æ–µ–∫—Ç–∏—Ä–æ–≤–∞–Ω–∏–µ –∏ —Ä–∞–∑–≤–æ—Ä–∞—á–∏–≤–∞–Ω–∏–µ –æ–ø—Ç–∏–º–∞–ª—å–Ω–æ–π –∏–Ω—Ñ—Ä–∞—Å—Ç—Ä—É–∫—Ç—É—Ä—ã –¥–ª—è –ø—Ä–∏–ª–æ–∂–µ–Ω–∏–π;
    • –û–ø—Ç–∏–º–∏–∑–∞—Ü–∏—è –ø—Ä–æ–∏–∑–≤–æ–¥–∏—Ç–µ–ª—å–Ω–æ—Å—Ç–∏ –ø—Ä–∏–ª–æ–∂–µ–Ω–∏–π –Ω–∞ —É—Ä–æ–≤–Ω–µ –∏–Ω—Ñ—Ä–∞—Å—Ç—Ä—É–∫—Ç—É—Ä—ã.

    –£—Å–ª–æ–≤–∏—è:

    • –°–µ–π—á–∞—Å –º—ã –≤—Å–µ —Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç–∞–µ–º —É–¥–∞–ª–µ–Ω–Ω–æ, –¥–∞–ª–µ–µ –ø–æ –∂–µ–ª–∞–Ω–∏—é –≤–æ–∑–º–æ–∂–µ–Ω –ø–æ–ª–Ω–æ—Å—Ç—å—é –¥–∏—Å—Ç–∞–Ω—Ü–∏–æ–Ω–Ω—ã–π –∏–ª–∏ –∫–æ–º–±–∏–Ω–∏—Ä–æ–≤–∞–Ω–Ω—ã–π —Ñ–æ—Ä–º–∞—Ç;

    • –ú–µ—Å—Ç–æ—Ä–∞—Å–ø–æ–ª–æ–∂–µ–Ω–∏–µ –æ—Ñ–∏—Å–∞: –º–µ—Ç—Ä–æ –ê–≤—Ç–æ–∑–∞–≤–æ–¥—Å–∫–∞—è, –±–∏–∑–Ω–µ—Å-—Ü–µ–Ω—Ç—Ä –°–∏–º–æ–Ω–æ–≤ –ü–ª–∞–∑–∞ (5-7 –º–∏–Ω—É—Ç –ø–µ—à–∫–æ–º –æ—Ç –º–µ—Ç—Ä–æ);

    • –í—ã—Å–æ–∫–∏–π —É—Ä–æ–≤–µ–Ω—å –æ–ø–ª–∞—Ç—ã —Ç—Ä—É–¥–∞, –æ–±—Å—É–∂–¥–∞–µ—Ç—Å—è –∏–Ω–¥–∏–≤–∏–¥—É–∞–ª—å–Ω–æ —Å —É—Å–ø–µ—à–Ω—ã–º –∫–∞–Ω–¥–∏–¥–∞—Ç–æ–º;

    • –û—Ñ–æ—Ä–º–ª–µ–Ω–∏–µ –ø–æ –¢–ö –†–§ (–æ—Ç–ø—É—Å–∫, –±–æ–ª—å–Ω–∏—á–Ω—ã–π) + —Å–æ—Ü–ø–∞–∫–µ—Ç;

  449. Middle/Senior SRE Engineer ("SOFTSWISS", –ú–∏–Ω—Å–∫) [ 2021-09-13 ]
    ...ibility to work in the co-working office space or remotely (outside the country as well) Relocate options ...

    We are looking for a Middle/Senior SRE Engineer with 3+ years of commercial experience to join our Online Casino Platform team.

    Company overview

    SOFTSWISS is a top company focused on the iGaming industry, providing an umbrella solution for large gaming and betting businesses. SOFTSWISS products include Online Casino Platform, Game Aggregator, Sportsbook Platform, Affiliate Engine, and casino games under the BGaming brand.

    SoftSwiss in numbers:

    • 2009 - foundation year
    • 800+ people in the company
    • 300+ gaming websites supported
    • 4B+ ‚Ç¨ bets processed per month
    • 150M+ ‚Ç¨ generated via our software monthly
    • 600K+ monthly active players

    For more information, please visit https://www.softswiss.com.

    Project overview

    We invite you to take the challenge and join our team of Online Casino Platform, the leading product of the company. It serves to manage all the online casino processes behind the scene including players, games, payments, bets, bonuses, tournaments, lotteries, and so on. Casino Platform is a Ruby-based high-loaded solution with lots of services and integrations built with a focus on security and stability. While you are reading this text, our web application has successfully processed 120,000 requests in one casino only, by the way, we have more than 100 ones.

    The product is in the active product development phase, it‚Äôs being actively developed and enhanced with new functionality and features. Our current stack:

    • Backend: Ruby on Rails, PostgreSQL, Kafka, RabbitMQ, Sidekiq, Redis, WebSockets
    • Technologies and Tools: Docker, K8S, MinIO, Vault, Swagger, Dry-rb, Jenkins, GitLab CI/CD
    • Monitoring: Datadog, Zabbix, Sentry, Kibana

    We are a team of 30+ real experts and fans of their work ready to always support each other. We are Agile-oriented and use the Scrum framework in our product development lifecycle. We are those who are setting trends for other teams.

    About you

    • 3+ years of expertise in at least one major technology stack designing, coding, and delivering software
    • Good experience with scripting and object-oriented programming languages (like Ruby, Python, Java, C#, etc.)
    • Good experience in process automation, infrastructure as code and monitoring solutions
    • Good experience with distributed systems and challenges as they scale
    • Hands-on experience in complex technical problem solving as a daily duty
    • Working knowledge of infrastructure components (e.g. routers, load balancers, container systems, compute, storage, and networks)
    • Strong knowledge in the internals of relational databases
    • Deep knowledge of SQL
    • Excellent debugging, analytical, problem-solving skills
    • English level: Intermediate and higher

    It‚Äôll be nice if you have

    • Understanding of Ruby on Rails key concepts
    • Event streaming systems and message brokers experience
    • Experience in database and application performance improvement (Hands-on experience in tuning solutions to improve performance)
    • Knowledge of caching techniques

    In this role, you will

    • Develop comprehensive monitoring solutions to provide full visibility to the different platform components
    • Build and enhance dashboards and alerting to monitor our apps and platform components
    • Troubleshoot priority incidents, facilitate blameless post-mortems and ensure permanent closure of incidents
    • Evaluate our apps and platform components performance, provide improvements to meet our response goals
    • Engage with the development team throughout the life cycle to help develop software for reliability and scale

    • Improve our CI/CD processes to make them as boring as possible (automatization, bots implementation and etc.)

    • Involve in DBA analysis and improvements
    • Involve in administration, performance tuning, optimization, backup, and recovery of a database

    Also, you will be able

    • Take part in a mentoring program
    • Take part in job interviews and contribute to our team growth
    • Contribute to internal knowledge base and development/support processes

    • As optional participate in the additional 8—Ö7 support coverage

    What we offer

    • Possibility to work in the co-working office space or remotely (outside the country as well)
    • Relocate options with company support
    • All Sports program compensation
    • Extended medical insurance program
    • Office located nearby subway with own secure parking
    • Salary is above the market level
    • Top hardware and additional equipment provided
    • Free English lessons
    • 4 paid sick days, 1 day off and 20 workdays vacation
    • Referral program
    • Paid training programs, certifications, conferences including international events
    • Corporate celebrations, team buildings, and fun activities

    If you are passionate about delivering high-quality software and have a strong background in Site Reliability Engineering, don‚Äôt hesitate to apply! We‚Äôre looking forward to you contributing to our Casino Platform team‚Äôs success and hope you're excited about this job opportunity!

  451. Senior DevOps Engineer (Limassol) ("Easybrain", –ö–∏–ø—Ä) [ 2021-09-13 ]
    ... office in Limassol (The Oval), modern equipment (remote work during COVID-19); - Snacks and drinks, gym i...

    Easybrain develops mobile games and applications that millions of people around the world play every day. Currently, we are looking for a highly motivated, responsible individual with a great experience in DevOps/System Engineering, to ensure the quality and continuous functional safety and security.

    Responsibilities:

    - Build and maintain server infrastructure;

    - Monitor, troubleshoot and resolve issues in our dev/test/production environments;

    - Automate deployment and delivery processes (CI/CD).

    Requirements:

    - 3+ years‚Äô experience in DevOps position;

    - Experience with Linux containers, cgroups, namespaces etc.;

    - Docker & LXC architecture knowledge;

    - Experience with at least one configuration management system, like Ansible/Chef/Puppet;

    - Experience with modern monitoring systems - Zabbix, Graphite/Grafana;

    - Experience with building CI/CD pipelines using Jenkins;

    - Experience with RDMBs, MySQL and PostgreSQL configuring, optimizing and troubleshooting;

    - Good experience with distributed web/REST systems;

    - Good bash scripting skills;

    - Experience with source control management, like Git as well as deployment and contributing code flows;

    - English language proficiency (intermediate level or higher);

    - Russian language proficiency is a must.

    Optional Requirements:

    - Experience with Puppet;

    - Experience with Yandex ClickHouse;

    - NoSQL and distributed data systems knowledge will be a plus;

    - Log collection and analyzing experience, ELK stack knowledge;

    - Familiar with microservice architecture;

    - Python programming/automation skills;

    - AWS or other clouds API automation experience.

    Benefits:

    Besides the engaging tasks, support from experienced colleagues, and the opportunity to realize your own ideas, challenge, and drive, we offer:

    - High income with performance bonuses;

    - Best office in Limassol (The Oval), modern equipment (remote work during COVID-19);

    - Snacks and drinks, gym in the office building, sea view, beach bar 100 metres from the workplace;

    - Attendance of key industry events;

    - Medical insurance;

    - Sports reimbursement;

    - English lessons;

    - Relocation package to the country with 300 sunny days a year;

    - Fast-paced and easy-going environment.


  452. DevOps Engineer ("The Product Engine", –û–¥–µ—Å—Å–∞) [ 2021-09-13 ]

    A highly scalable microservice application for AI based document processing. It is offering multiple document processing workflows, such as OCR, machine learning predictions etc.
    Technologies: Cloud Services, Docker, Kubernetes, Python

    The application is deployed in Microsoft Azure Kubernetes clusters (AKS) across 7 regions across the world.

    Required skills:

    • Cloud Computing Services (AWS, Azure or other)
    • Docker
    • Kubernetes
    • Ansible
    • Experience in CI/CD automation
    • Spoken English knowledge (intermediate or better)


    Would be a plus:

    • RabbitMQ, Redis;
    • Microsoft Azure experience;
    • JIRA, Git
    • Experience with Python;


    Responsibilities:

    • Build and maintain CI/CD pipelines
    • Deploy microservices to Kubernetes clusters in multiple regions
    • Maintain existing Microsoft Azure cloud infrastructure


    Provided for you:

    • Work in well-organized professional team in the center of Odessa
    • Interesting and challenging tasks, opportunities for career growths
    • English language courses at work in the middle of the day
    • Flexible work schedule, possibility to work from home
    • Ability to participate in Corporate Events and Business trips


  453. SRE/DevOps for Infrastructure Team [Remote] ("Cloud Linux", –û–¥–µ—Å—Å–∞) [ 2021-09-13 ]
    ...mp; desire to research & learn. Work is fully remote, with flexible hours, where you can plan your day...

    We are looking for SRE / DevOps engineer with a strong knowledge of how to configure and maintain highly available, reliable MySQL, PostgreSQL, Redis, etc‚Ä¶ services -- and automate such deployments. The job is for a Linux expert with a strong drive to automate things & desire to research & learn.

    Work is fully remote, with flexible hours, where you can plan your day and work from anywhere.

    Requirements:

    • 3+ years of Linux experience
    • Detailed knowledge on setting up and maintaining high availability self-healing clusters of MySQL, PostgreSQL and/or Redis
    • Experience in setupping reliable private network channels between nodes with low latency. Mesh VPN (wireguard, tinc), client/server cert auth (with optional ssl tcp proxy terminator), any similar tech
    • Real experience with network partitioning issues and other problems with distributed systems
    • Advanced troubleshooting skills
    • Strong knowledge of Python or Go
    • Experience working with docker, containers

    What is for you?

    • A great opportunity for professional development within a young and fast-growing company
    • Interesting and challenging projects
    • Remote work on a full-time basis under a long-term contract
    • Compensation in US dollars
    • Flexible working hours
    • Paid one month vacation per year and sick leaves
    • Days off on national holidays
    • Medical insurance
    • Co-working compensation
    • English Language training
    • Challenging tasks
    • Knowledge-Exchange

    If you want to become a part of a friendly team, to work with the latest, leading technologies, be proud of your work and want to be part of something bigger - we are waiting for you!

    Let‚Äôs make it a win-win for you and CloudLinux. Do not put off until later - apply today and our team will gladly welcome you.

    By applying for this position, you agree with Cloudlinux Privacy Policy and give us your consent to maintain and process your personal data with this respect. Please read our Privacy Policy for more information.

    • –†–∞–∑—Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç–∫–∞ –∏ –ø–æ—Å—Ç–æ—è–Ω–Ω–æ–µ –æ–±–Ω–æ–≤–ª–µ–Ω–∏–µ —Ä–µ–≥–ª–∞–º–µ–Ω—Ç–Ω–æ–π –¥–æ–∫—É–º–µ–Ω—Ç–∞—Ü–∏–∏.
